name: application-version-management
description: Critical rule: Application version MUST be incremented for EVERY code change

changes.description: Application version is displayed at the bottom of the sidebar in the web app
changes.impact: Users can see the current application version at all times

changes.description: CRITICAL RULE: For EVERY code change made to the project, the application version number at public/index.html:539 MUST be incremented
changes.impact: Ensures version tracking is accurate and users can identify which version they are running

criticalRules.rule: Increment application version for EVERY code change
criticalRules.enforcement: MANDATORY - Must be done before committing any code changes
criticalRules.example: If current version is v1.0.14 and you fix a bug, update to v1.0.15

criticalRules.rule: Update skill file versions when modifying related code
criticalRules.enforcement: MANDATORY - When code documented in a skill file is modified, that skill's version must be incremented
criticalRules.example: If you modify utils/pathUtils.js, update skills/path-normalization.json version

workflow.description: Implement the requested feature, bug fix, or modification
Update the version number at public/index.html:539 (increment patch version by 1)
Search for skill files that document the modified code and increment their versions

workflow.action: STOP and wait for user to commit
workflow.description: NEVER automatically run git add/commit/push. User will do git operations manually.
